item.title: Wine of the Week: Rodney Strong's Sonoma Coast Chardonnay
item.description:
Wine of the Week: Rodney Strong's Sonoma Coast Chardonnay

"Sonoma County is the chosen spot." That's Luther Burbank's famous quote, but Justin Seidenfeld agrees wholeheartedly. The Rodney Strong winemaker is behind our wine of the week winner - the Rodney Strong Estate Vineyards, 2014 Sonoma Coast, Sonoma County Chardonnay at $25. "I would say the diversity of Sonoma County is unmatched anywhere in the world," Seidenfeld said.

item.title: The Wine Show Series Trailer - Starring Matthew Goode & Matthew Rhys
item.description:
The Wine Show Series Trailer - Starring Matthew Goode & Matthew Rhys

Matthew Goode & Matthew Rhys star in this new brand new 13 x 1 hour television series, for broadcast on ITV Spring 2016. Filmed in beautiful locations all over the world, The Wine Show is informative, entertaining, humorous and surprising, with something for everyone who enjoys a glass of wine.

item.title: Events - California Wines
item.description:
Events - California Wines

Amador Vintner's wine extravaganza Behind the Cellar Door is a weekend of Wine Seminars, Sneak-Peeks, Special & Large Format Wines, Wine Offerings, Silent Auction, Music & More.

item.title: How to Get a Free Uber Ride This Weekend
item.description:
How to Get a Free Uber Ride This Weekend

Uber customers with Capital One cards who like car pooling just hit the jackpot, as the two companies announced Wednesday a promotion to offer Capital One customers four free rides on UberPOOL to be all weekend long. The promo goes from Friday, March 4 through Sunday, March 6.

item.title: Wine Talk:Dreaming under the Tuscan sun
item.description:
Wine Talk:Dreaming under the Tuscan sun

Throughout history, Jews have made wine at home out of necessity. They needed wine so they could sanctify festivals and Shabbat. Jewish and kosher wine was really a cottage industry throughout the ages. Wine was made in buckets and bathtubs or any receptacle that was available, from local table grapes to raisins.

item.title: Cellar Collections
item.description:
Cellar Collections

Stemmler 2013 Pinot Noir, Sonoma Coast "Medium ruby in color, with expressive aromas of blackberry, kirsch, cherry, watermelon and pencil lead. The palate shows bright cherry and raspberry, with fresh plum and spice notes on the finish. Earthy yet juicy, this supple Pinot shows wonderful finesse and depth."

item.title: Can't Miss Wine Events: CabFest, Flavor!, Festival Napa Valley, Bottega Gran Fondo | Stark Insider
item.description:
Can't Miss Wine Events: CabFest, Flavor!, Festival Napa Valley, Bottega Gran Fondo | Stark Insider

Spring is just about here, and with summer just around the corner it can only mean one thing: the Stark Insider calendar is filling up with a tonne of can't miss food and wine events across the Napa Valley. All of them - so far - feature familiar faces ( CabFest and Flavor!
